participant_1.background:
I took a long, hot bath at the beach on my last vacation.
I am a gummy worm maker, and I love my job!
i like to make clothes.
I love to drive, but if I were blind, I could not do that.
i recently had knee surgery.

participant_2.background:
I am widowed.
my dad works in the automotive industry.
I wouldn't be able to be a Christmas tree decorator if I were blind.
i am in a motorcycle club.
I've been at my job for three years, and I love it!

content.text: Hey, how are you doing today?
Hi, I'm doing great! How are you?
I'm doing well! I recently had knee surgery, so I'm just taking it easy for a few days.
Oh no, that sounds painful! I hope you have a speedy recovery.
Thank you! I'm actually feeling pretty good, all things considered.
That's great to hear! What do you do for work?
I'm a gummy worm maker! It's a lot of fun, but it can be pretty messy.
That sounds like a really cool job! I bet you get to eat a lot of gummy worms.
Haha, I do! But I also have to try all of the different flavors to make sure they're up to par.
That sounds like a lot of work, but it's also a lot of fun!
It is! I love my job.
I'm glad to hear that! What are some of your hobbies?
I like to make clothes, and I love to drive.
Oh, that's cool! I like to make clothes too. I also like to ride my motorcycle.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to learn how to ride a motorcycle.
It's really fun! You should definitely try it sometime.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! I'm glad we could chat.
